13/14 Delegation A Aiki Shirin Delegation na Shardeum ya buɗe ƙofa ga mutane da yawa don shiga cikin tsaron network. A cikin mako biyu kacal: An stake SHM biliyan 1.2 (1.2B) SHM miliyan 810 (810M) daga hannun al’umma Delegate. Kare Network. Samu Riba.

10/14 Daga Super Shardians zuwa Ambassadors A shekarar 2025, Super Shardians sun bunƙasa zuwa cikakken Shirin Ambassador, wanda ya haɗa: masu ƙirƙirar content, developers, masu fassara, moderators da shugabannin al’umma. Ga tasirin da aka samu a watan farko kawai a X

3/14 Golden Gate Mainnet A ranar 5 ga Mayu, 2025, mainnet na Shardeum (na token kawai) ya fara aiki a hukumance. Al’umma ce ta sanya masa suna Golden Gate, wanda ya tabbatar da hangen nesa na decentralization da ke fifita al’umma (community-first). Wannan lokaci ne na tarihi
